ingredients.item: 600g pack Essential British Chicken Breast Fillets, sliced
400g can Essential Lentils In Water, drained
75g Essential Waitrose Pitted Black Olives In Brine, drained and roughly chopped

instructions.step: Heat the oil in a large shallow saucepan for frying pan and gently fry the chicken and onions for 10 minutes until browned, stirring frequently. Add the garlic and fry for a further 1 minute.

Add the tomatoes, lentils, olives and 150ml water and bring to a gentle simmer. Cover with a lid and cook for 12-15 minutes until the chicken is thoroughly cooked (no pink meat) and the sauce has thickened slightly. Season to taste and serve.
